channel.title: Comments on: Using CFID and CFToken to jump between ColdFusion servers
channel.description: Web development notes and commentary from Ryan Stille

item.title: By: Kaye Swiftney
item.dc:creator: Kaye Swiftney
item.description:
I have no idea how to do what you are talking about. I am lost. I show a CFID=91314:path and CFToken-73019824:path=/
I have always been able to get into this web site and now I cannot. Thank you Kaye
item.content:encoded:
I have no idea how to do what you are talking about. I am lost. I show a CFID=91314:path and
CFToken-73019824:path=/

I have always been able to get into this web site and now I cannot. Thank you Kaye
